pages.text: $(li)iChisel is the direct upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:tools/chisel/diamond_chisel)Diamond Chisel$(/l).$(br)$(li)This one has more durability and two new modes than the last one.
$(li)Preview Mode: This function allows you to see the Chiseled version resultant block before convert it.
$(li)Contiguous: Chisel an area of alike blocks, extending 10 blocks in any direction.
$(li)Contiguous (2D): Chisel an area of alike blocks, extending 10 blocks along the plane of the current side.
